name: The BoX
description: The BoX takes the speed of a beloved platformer of old and mixes it up with color based powers and adaptations. Here you will find a mystery only you can solve with complex challenges along the way to guide you in finding the answer. Use the 6 colors at your disposal to take on the treacherous BoX and find your way to freedom.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP + Видеокарта: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work. DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 125 MB
